definition: surname Piao/Korean surname (Park, Pak, or Bak)/also pr. [Pu2]

sentences.english: My house is in the hills above Tiupllo, a very simple place.
sentences.chinese: 我的家在西班牙特普罗的山上，是个淳朴的地方。

sentences.english: Hank is a small-town country boy.
sentences.chinese: 汉克是个淳朴的乡下少年。

sentences.english: The essence of French savoir-vivre is simplicity.
sentences.chinese: 法国人的处世之道的实质就是淳朴。

sentences.english: It is full of breath-taking landscape, ancient history, simple folkway , wonderful culture.
sentences.chinese: 可谓是风景秀丽，历史古老，民风淳朴，文化灿烂。

sentences.english: It provides one with a sense of the natural idea and course of love between men and women.
sentences.chinese: 画中传递出一派淳朴之感和男女间爱情模式。

sentences.english: Wang Baoqiang's signature innocent smile never changes.
sentences.chinese: 王宝强招牌式的淳朴笑容从来没有变过。

sentences.english: We are intending to render the character of nature, artlessness and novelty back to the normal state.
sentences.chinese: 我们要还它以自然，淳朴，新颖的常态。

sentences.english: “I thought this was a good town,” says one resident.
sentences.chinese: “我本以为这是个淳朴的小镇，”一位居民表示。

sentences.english: Here folkway is simple, and has the name of xanadu.
sentences.chinese: 这里民风淳朴，有“世外桃源”之称。

sentences.english: The characteristic style doors overlaid antique white oak PVC, are warm and simple.
sentences.chinese: 特色门板边型吸附仿古白橡木PVC，柔和且淳朴的。
他是一个淳朴的庄稼人。

sentences.english: The rough texture of the tiles added a rustic charm to the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 这种瓷砖粗旷的质地增加了这个厨房淳朴的风味。

sentences.english: If human nature were good, would we keep this up for thousands of years ?
sentences.chinese: 如果人性本善，我们能将这份淳朴流传千年而不走样？

sentences.english: The honest villagers came from a lonely village.
sentences.chinese: 这些淳朴的乡民来自于一个偏远的乡村。
淳朴与诚实被讽刺为灵活幼稚。

definition: variant of 淳樸|淳朴[chun2 pu3]
hospitality/to treat guests well/to enjoy having guests/hospitable/friendly
quiet and contented/indifferent to fame or gain
